name: Origins (JacoDepa)
description:
Hello and welcome to the very first version of the game Origins!

What is Origins?

Origins is a simple project I started on the side while I'm studying at University. The game is a simple text-based clicker game where all you have to do is click buttons and manage your resources to unlock and buy new stuff.

The game is still in early development and far from finished, but I decided to start releasing a version to see what people thought about the game, so please leave a comment with your impressions after you play it.

Note: The game has no save system as of now, it will be implemented in later versions, but for now the game can be completed in a short session.
